text: 6:9 Aghuzir Akaba 23:4; 28:22; Matyu 13:22; 1 Timoti 1:19; 3:7; Jems 5:1Ezɨ gumazamizir dagɨaba iniasa bar ifongeziba, Satan me gifara men nɨghnɨzibagh etui, mati asɨzim azuazim gupuzɨ moghɨn, men naviba, arazir onganir avɨrir osɨmtɨziba anɨdibar amusɨ dɨkavtɨ, bizir kam bar me damu me gasɨghasɨghtɨ me bar ikuvigham.
